segments.text: This scene presents a strange tableau of domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her plate that she misses everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete unawareness of the overflowing sink is really quite frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is steadily running down the cabinets and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a serious mess and a slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are engaged in their own secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on that stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's only a matter of time before he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she paying any attention to her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are multiple potential accidents unfolding simultaneously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of negligence is truly infuriating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels on the verge of collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR
